SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT567
SwiftMessageFormat.DescriptiveName: Corporate Action Status and Processing Advice
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by an account servicer (account servicing institution) to an account owner or its designated agent. The account servicer may be a local agent (sub-custodian) acting on behalf of their global custodian customer, or a custodian acting on behalf of an investment management institution or a broker/dealer.
This message is used to advise the status, or a change in status, of a corporate action-related transaction previously instructed by, or executed on behalf of, the account owner. This will include the acknowledgement/ rejection of a corporate action instruction or the acknowledgement/rejection of a request to cancel an outstanding instruction. It may also be used to provide a reason as to why a corporate action event has not been completed by the announced payment dates.
This message may also be used to:
a) re-send a corporate action status previously sent
b) provide a third party with a copy of the message.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T86):

Code.Name: CAST
Code.Description: Message reporting on a cancellation request status.

Code.Name: EVST
Code.Description: Message reporting on a corporate action event status.

Code.Name: INST
Code.Description: Message reporting on an instruction status.

Validation.Comment: Subfunction, when present, must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85):

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CAEV and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: ACTV
Code.Description: Trading in the security has commenced or security has been re-activated after a suspension in trading.

Code.Name: ATTI
Code.Description: Combination of different security types to create a unit. Units are usually comprised of warrants and bonds or warrants and equities. Securities may be combined at the request of the security holder or based on market convention.

Code.Name: BIDS
Code.Description: Offer to existing holders by the issuing company to repurchase its own securities. The objective of the offer is to reduce the number of outstanding securities.

Code.Name: BMET
Code.Description: Physical meeting of bond holders.

Code.Name: BONU
Code.Description: Bonus, scrip or capitalisation issue. Security holders receive additional assets free of payment from the issuer, in proportion to their holding.

Code.Name: BPUT
Code.Description: Early redemption of a security at the election of the holder subject to the terms and condition of the issue with no reduction in nominal value .

Code.Name: BRUP
Code.Description: Legal status of a company unable to pay creditors. Bankruptcy usually involves a formal court ruling. Securities may become valueless.

Code.Name: CAPD
Code.Description: The Corporate event pays shareholders an amount in cash issued from the Capital account. There is no reduction to the face value of a single share(or the share has no par value). The number of circulating shares remains unchanged.

Code.Name: CAPG
Code.Description: Distribution of profits resulting from the sale of company assets, eg, Shareholders of Mutual Funds, Unit Trusts, or Sicavs are recipients of capital gains distributions which are often reinvested in additional shares of the fund.

Code.Name: CAPI
Code.Description: Increase of the current principal of a debt instrument without increasing the nominal value. It normally arises from the incorporation of due but unpaid interest into the principal. This is commonly done by increasing the pool factor value, eg, capitalisation, and negative amortisation

Code.Name: CERT
Code.Description: Non-US beneficial owner certification requirement for exchange of temporary to permanent notes.

Code.Name: CHAN
Code.Description: Information regarding a change further described in the corporate action details.

Code.Name: CLSA
Code.Description: Situation where interested parties seek restitution for financial loss. The security holder may be offered the opportunity to join a class action proceeding and would need to respond with an instruction.

Code.Name: CMET
Code.Description: Announcement of a meeting at a Court.

Code.Name: CONS
Code.Description: Procedure that aims to obtain consent of holder to a proposal by the issuer or a third party without convening a meeting. For example, consent to change the terms of a bond

Code.Name: CONV
Code.Description: Conversion of securities (generally convertible bonds or preferred shares) into another form of securities (usually common shares) at a pre-stated price/ratio.

Code.Name: COOP
Code.Description: A Company Option may be granted by the company, allowing the holder to take up shares at some future date(s) at a pre arranged price in the company. A company may not grant options which enable the holder to take up unissued shares at a time which is five or more years from the date of the grant. Option holders are not members of a company. They are contingent creditors of a company and hence may, in some instances, be entitled to vote on and be bound by a scheme of arrangement between the creditors and the company. As many options have multiple exercise periods a company option will either lapse or carry on to the next expiry date.

Code.Name: CREV
Code.Description: An occurrence of credit derivative for which the issuer of one or several underlying securities is unable to fulfill his financial obligations (as defined in terms and conditions).

Code.Name: DECR
Code.Description: Reduction of face value of a single share or the value of fund assets . The number of circulating shares/units remains unchanged. This event may include a cash payout to holders.

Code.Name: DETI
Code.Description: Separation of components that comprise a security, eg, usually units comprised of warrants and bond or warrants and equity. Units may be broken up at the request of the security holder or based on market convention.

Code.Name: DFLT
Code.Description: Failure by the company to perform obligations defined as default events under the bond agreement and that have not been remedied.

Code.Name: DLST
Code.Description: Security is no longer able to comply with the listing requirements of a stock exchange and is removed from official board quotation.

Code.Name: DRAW
Code.Description: Redemption in part before the scheduled final maturity date of a security. Drawing is distinct from partial call since drawn bonds are chosen by lottery and with no reduction in nominal value

Code.Name: DRCA
Code.DetailedName: Cash Distribution From Non-Eligible Securities Sales
Code.Description: Distribution to shareholders of cash resulting from the selling of non-eligible securities, for example, in the frame of a depositary receipt program

Code.Name: DRIP
Code.Description: Dividend payment where holders can keep cash or have the cash reinvested in the market by the issuer into additional shares in the issuing company. To be distinguished from DVOP as the company invests the dividend in the market rather than creating new share capital in exchange for the dividend.

Code.Name: DSCL
Code.Description: Requirement for holders or beneficial owners to disclose their name, location and holdings of any issue to the issuer.

Code.Name: DTCH
Code.Description: An action by a party wishing to acquire a security. Holders of the security are invited to make an offer to sell, within a specific price range. The acquiring party will buy from the holder with lowest offer.

Code.Name: DVCA
Code.Description: Distribution of cash to shareholders, in proportion to their equity holding. Ordinary dividends are recurring and regular.

Code.Name: DVOP
Code.Description: Distribution of a dividend to shareholders with a choice of benefit to receive. Shareholders may choose to receive shares or cash. To be distinguished from DRIP as the company creates new share capital in exchange for the dividend rather than investing the dividend in the market.

Code.Name: DVSC
Code.Description: Dividend or interest paid in the form of scrip.

Code.Name: DVSE
Code.Description: Dividend paid to shareholders in the form of equities of the issuing corporation.

Code.Name: EXOF
Code.Description: Exchange of holdings for other securities and/or cash. The exchange can be either mandatory or voluntary involving the exchange of outstanding securities for different securities and/or cash. For example "exchange offer". "capital reorganisation" or "funds separation".

Code.Name: EXRI
Code.Description: Call or exercise on nil paid securities or intermediate securities resulting from an intermediate securities distribution (RHDI). This code is used for the second event, when an intermediate securities' issue (rights/coupons) is composed of two events, the first event being the distribution of intermediate securities.

Code.Name: EXTM
Code.Description: As stipulated in a bond's Terms and Conditions, the issuer or the bond-holder may prolong the maturity date of a bond. After extension, the security may differ from original issue (new rate or maturity date). May be subject to bondholder's approval.

Code.Name: EXWA
Code.Description: Option offered to holders to buy (call warrant) or to sell (put warrant) a specific amount of stock, cash, or commodity, at a predetermined price, during a predetermined period of time (which usually corresponds to the life of the issue).

Code.Name: INCR
Code.Description: Increase in the face value of a single security. The number of circulating securities remains unchanged .

Code.Name: INTR
Code.Description: Interest payment distributed to holders of an interest bearing asset.

Code.Name: LIQU
Code.Description: A distribution of cash, assets or both. Debt may be paid in order of priority based on preferred claims to assets specified by the security.

Code.Name: MCAL
Code.Description: The redemption of an entire issue outstanding of securities, eg, bonds, preferred equity, funds, by the issuer or its agent, eg, asset manager, before final maturity

Code.Name: MEET
Code.Description: Annual general meeting.

Code.Name: MRGR
Code.Description: Exchange of outstanding securities, initiated by the issuer which may include options, as the result of two or more companies combining assets, ie, an external, third party company.Cashpayments may accompany share exchange.

Code.Name: NOOF
Code.Description: Offers that are not supervised or regulated by an official entity and being offered by a party, for example a broker, usually at a discount price, for example broker offer, mini-tender, mini odd lot offer or third party offer.

Code.Name: ODLT
Code.Description: Sale or purchase of odd-lots to/from the issuing company, initiated either by the holder of the security or through an offer made by the issuer.

Code.Name: OMET
Code.Description: Ordinary general meeting.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Other event, use only when no other event type applies, eg, a new event type.

Code.Name: PARI
Code.Description: Occurs when securities with different characteristics, eg, shareswith different entitlements to dividend or voting rights, become identical in all respects, eg, pari-passu or assimilation. May be scheduled in advance, eg, shares resulting from a bonus may become fungible after a pre-set period of time, or may result from outside events, eg, merger, reorganisation, issue of supplementary tranches, etc.

Code.Name: PCAL
Code.DetailedName: Partial Redemption With Reduction of Nominal Value
Code.Description: Securities are redeemed in part before their scheduled final maturity date with reduction of the nominal value of the securities. The outstanding amount of securities will be reduced proportionally.

Code.Name: PDEF
Code.Description: Issuer has money set aside to redeem a portion of an issue and the indenture states that the securities could be called earlier than the stated maturity.

Code.Name: PINK
Code.Description: Interest payment, in any kind except cash, distributed to holders of an interest bearing asset.

Code.Name: PLAC
Code.Description: Changes in the state of incorporation for US companies and changes in the place of incorporation for foreign companies. Where shares need to be registered following the incorporation change, the holder(s) may have to elect the registrar.

Code.Name: PPMT
Code.Description: An instalment towards the purchase of equity capital, subject to an agreement between an issuer and a purchaser.

Code.Name: PRED
Code.DetailedName: Partial Redemption Without Reduction of Nominal Value
Code.Description: Securities are redeemed in part before their scheduled final maturity date without reduction of the nominal value of the securities. This is commonly done by pool factor reduction.

Code.Name: PRII
Code.Description: An event which consists of two components, the decrease of the amortized value of a pool factor security and an interest payment.

Code.Name: PRIO
Code.Description: Form of open or public offer where, due to a limited amount of securities available, priority is given to existing shareholders.

Code.Name: REDM
Code.Description: The redemption of an entire issue outstanding of securities, eg, bonds,preferred equity, funds, by the issuer or its agent, eg, asset manager, at final maturity.

Code.Name: REDO
Code.Description: Event by which the unit (currency and/or nominal) of a security is restated, eg, nominal/par value of security in a national currency is restated in another currency.

Code.Name: REMK
Code.Description: Purchase and sale of remarketed preferred equities/bonds through the negotiation of interest rate between the issuers and the holders.

Code.Name: RHDI
Code.Description: The distribution of intermediate securities that gives the holder the right to take part in a future event.

Code.Name: RHTS
Code.DetailedName: Rights Issue / Subscription Rights / Rights Offer
Code.Description: Offer to holders of a security to subscribe for additional securities via the distribution of an intermediate security. Both processes are included in the same event.

Code.Name: SHPR
Code.Description: This corporate event pays shareholders an amount in cash issued from the shares premium reserve. It is similar to a dividend but with different tax implications.

Code.Name: SMAL
Code.Description: Modification of the smallest negotiable unit of shares in order to obtain a new negotiable unit.

Code.Name: SOFF
Code.Description: A distribution of subsidiary stock to the shareholders of the parent company without a surrender of shares. Spin-off represents a form of divestiture usually resulting in an independent company or in an existing company. For example, demerger, distribution, unbundling.

Code.Name: SPLF
Code.Description: Increase in a corporation's number of outstanding equities without any change in the shareholder's equity or the aggregate market value at the time of the split. Equity price and nominal value are reduced accordingly.

Code.Name: SPLR
Code.DetailedName: Reverse Stock Split/Change in Nominal Value
Code.Description: Decrease in a company's number of outstanding equities without any change in the shareholder's equity or the aggregate market value at the time of the split.Equity price and nominal value are increased accordingly.

Code.Name: SUSP
Code.Description: Trading in the security has been suspended.

Code.Name: TEND
Code.Description: An offer made to holders by a third party, requesting them to sell (tender) or exchange their securities.

Code.Name: TREC
Code.Description: Event related to tax reclaim activities.

Code.Name: WRTH
Code.Description: Booking out of valueless securities.

Code.Name: WTRC
Code.Description: Certification process for withholding tax reduction or exemption based on the tax status of the holder.

Code.Name: XMET
Code.Description: Extraordinary or special general meeting.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
If Qualifier is EPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: COMP
Code.Description: Processing has been completed.

Code.Name: PEND
Code.Description: Processing has not been completed.

Code.Name: RECD
Code.Description: Indicates that the funds paid have been reconciled with the funds received from the Agent (meaning that there is no more risk of payment to be reversed).

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is IPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled.

Code.Name: DFLA
Code.Description: Default action is taken.

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Instruction has been accepted. This means that the instruction has been received, is processable and has been validated for further processing .

Code.Name: PEND
Code.Description: Instruction's processing is pending.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Instruction has been rejected for further processing due to system reasons.

Code.Name: STIN
Code.Description: Standing instruction is applied.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CPRC and Data Source Scheme is not present, Status Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K25):

Code.Name: CAND
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been completed.

Code.Name: CANP
Code.Description: Cancellation request is pending. It is not known at this time whether cancellation can be affected.

Code.Name: PACK
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been accepted for further processing.

Code.Name: REJT
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been rejected for further processing due to system (data) reasons.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PEND and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: AUTH
Code.Description: For tax reclaim, the event is pending because the reclaim is sent to the tax authorities.

Code.Name: BOIS
Code.Description: Pending receipt of beneficiary owner details.

Code.Name: CERT
Code.Description: Instruction is rejected since the provided certification is incorrect or incomplete.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid instructed quantity.

Code.Name: LACK
Code.Description: Insufficient financial instruments in your account.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Instruction was received after market deadline.

Code.Name: MCER
Code.Description: Awaiting receipt of adequate certification.

Code.Name: MONY
Code.Description: Insufficient cash in your account.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: NPAY
Code.Description: Payment has not been made by issuer.

Code.Name: NSEC
Code.Description: Financial instruments have not been delivered by the issuer.

Code.Name: PENR
Code.Description: The instruction is pending receipt of securities, eg, from a purchase, loan etc .

Code.Name: VLDA
Code.Description: For tax reclaim, the event is pending, the tax reclaim is valid for the tax authorities.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is REJT and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Received after the account servicer's deadline.

Code.Name: BOIS
Code.Description: Rejected due to missing beneficiary owner details.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Option is not valid; it has been cancelled by the market or service provider, and cannot be responded to. Any responses already processed against this option are considered void and new responses will be required .

Code.Name: CERT
Code.Description: Instruction is rejected since the provided certification is incorrect or incomplete.

Code.Name: DCAN
Code.Description: Cancellation request was rejected since the instruction has already been cancelled.

Code.Name: DPRG
Code.Description: Cancellation request has been rejected because the instruction process is in progress or has been processed.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid instructed quantity.

Code.Name: DSEC
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid financial instrument identification.

Code.Name: EVNM
Code.DetailedName: Unrecognised Corporate Action Event Number Rejection
Code.Description: Unrecognised corporate action event number.

Code.Name: INIR
Code.Description: The instruction is irrevocable

Code.Name: INTV
Code.Description: Option is not active and can no longer be responded to. Any responses already processed against this option will remain valid, eg, expired option.

Code.Name: INVA
Code.Description: For tax reclaim, the reclaim is invalid for the tax authorities.

Code.Name: LACK
Code.Description: Instructed position exceeds the eligible balance.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Received after market deadline.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason

Code.Name: NMTY
Code.DetailedName: Mismatch Option Number and Option Type Rejection
Code.Description: Mismatch between option number and option type.

Code.Name: OPNM
Code.Description: Unrecognised option number.

Code.Name: OPTY
Code.Description: Invalid option type.

Code.Name: REFT
Code.Description: Reclaim is refused by the tax authorities.

Code.Name: SAFE
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid message sender's safekeeping account.

Code.Name: ULNK
Code.Description: Linked reference is unknown.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CANP and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: ADEA
Code.Description: Received after the account servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis.

Code.Name: DQUA
Code.Description: Unrecognised or invalid instructed quantity.

Code.Name: LATE
Code.Description: Received after market deadline.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is CAND and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: CANI
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled as per your request.

Code.Name: CANO
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by another party than the instructing party, e.g.market infrastructure such as a Stock Exchange.

Code.Name: CANS
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by the system.

Code.Name: CSUB
Code.Description: Instruction has been cancelled by the agent, for example, due to an event deadline extension.

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Validation.Comment: If Qualifier is PACK and Data Source Scheme is not present, Reason Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K24):

Code.Name: NARR
Code.Description: See narrative field for reason.

Code.Name: NSTP
Code.Description: Instruction was not STP and had to be processed manually .

Validation.Comment: In option F or H, if Qualifier is CAOP and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22):

Code.Name: ABST
Code.Description: Vote expressed as abstain. In this case, the issuing company will add the number of shares to the quorum of the meeting. If the voting right is not executed, it will not be added to the quorum. In this case, code NOAC should be used.

Code.Name: AMGT
Code.Description: Vote against management.

Code.Name: BSPL
Code.Description: Receive equities from the Share Premium Reserve of the company and considered as a capital distribution rather than a disbursement of income with different tax implications (typically found in Australia).

Code.Name: BUYA
Code.Description: Buy additional securities to round up position.

Code.Name: CASE
Code.Description: Corporate action option includes a distribution of both cash and securities to holders.

Code.Name: CASH
Code.Description: Distribution of cash to holders.

Code.Name: CEXC
Code.Description: Vote to consent to change the terms of the securities agreement and to exchange securities.

Code.Name: CONN
Code.Description: Vote not to approve the event or proposal.

Code.Name: CONY
Code.Description: Vote to approve the event or proposal.

Code.Name: CTEN
Code.Description: Vote to consent to change the terms of the securities agreement and to tender securities for cash.

Code.Name: EXER
Code.Description: Exercise intermediate securities or warrants.

Code.Name: LAPS
Code.Description: Allow event or entitled security to expire.

Code.Name: MKDW
Code.Description: Mark down the global certificate as a result of a corporate action (instruction from ICSDs to common depositories who are holding the global certificate on behalf of the ICSDs.

Code.Name: MKUP
Code.Description: Mark up the global certificate as a result of a corporate action (instruction from ICSDs to common depositories who are holding the global certificate on behalf of the ICSDs).

Code.Name: MNGT
Code.Description: Vote with management.

Code.Name: MPUT
Code.Description: An option that allows a holder to elect to retain their holding, eg, a putable bond.

Code.Name: NOAC
Code.Description: Option for the account owner not to take part in the event. This would include opt-out for class actions and lodging of dissenters' rights.

Code.Name: NOQU
Code.Description: The account owner is a Non-Qualified Investor.

Code.Name: OFFR
Code.Description: In a remarketing of variable notes, the margin that shareholders can propose in respect of the next interest period.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Generic corporate action option to be used in case that no other specific code is appropriate.

Code.Name: OVER
Code.Description: Subscribe to more equities than underlying securities position allows.

Code.Name: PROX
Code.Description: Issue a proxy card in case of voting.

Code.Name: PRUN
Code.Description: Proceeds not known during election period. The option can result in cash and/or securities.

Code.Name: QINV
Code.Description: The account owner is a Qualified Investor

Code.Name: SECU
Code.Description: Distribution of securities to holders.

Code.Name: SLLE
Code.Description: Sell the intermediate securities.

Code.Name: SPLI
Code.Description: Option to give a split instruction, eg, a split voting instruction on a meeting.

Code.Name: TAXI
Code.Description: Tax instruction.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'.(Error code(s): T26).
Narrative (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Country must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option B, if Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: ALLP
Code.Description: Used when there is a need to indicate that the details apply to all places of safekeeping where the financial instrument is held.

Code.Name: SHHE
Code.Description: Used for certain financial instruments, eg, US mutual funds, where settlement is internal only, ie, there is no external movement of securities.

Validation.Comment: In option F, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94):

Code.Name: CUST
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at a local custodian.

Code.Name: ICSD
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at an International Central Securities Depository.

Code.Name: NCSD
Code.Description: Financial instruments held at a National Central Securities Depository.

Code.Name: SHHE
Code.Description: Used for certain financial instruments, eg, US mutual funds, where settlement is internal only, ie, there is no external movement of securities.

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) |(Description Of Security)

Validation.Comment: Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36):

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

Validation.Qualifiers: ATAX, CAPG, CHAR, CINL, COUN, EXEC, FLFR, GRSS, INCO, INDM, INTR, ISDI, LEVY, LOCL, LOCO, MKTC, NETT, PAMM, PRIN, REDP, REGF, REIN, SHIP, SOFE, SOIC, SPCN, STAM, STEX, SUBS, TAXC, TAXR, TRAN, TRAX, TXDF, TXFR, TXRC, UNFR, VATA, WITF, WITL
Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).

Validation.Qualifiers: ATAX, CAPG, CHAR, CINL, COUN, EXEC, FLFR, GRSS, INCO, INDM, INTR, ISDI, LEVY, LOCL, LOCO, MKTC, NETT, PAMM, PRIN, REDP, REGF, REIN, SHIP, SOFE, SOIC, SPCN, STAM, STEX, SUBS, TAXC, TAXR, TRAN, TRAX, TXDF, TXFR, TXRC, UNFR, VATA, WITF, WITL
Validation.Comment: The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for the specified currency.

Qualifier.Name: ELIG
Qualifier.Description: Total Eligible for Corporate Action Balance

Validation.Comment: When Sign is present, Balance must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
If Data Source Scheme is not present, Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K93):

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, that is, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, for example, a number of shares.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Name & Address (Format Option V) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26).

Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26).

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-35B-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: B.F35B.Identification_Of_Security + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-35B-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c";

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 "Within each occurrence of subsequence A2a, the qualifier in field 24B must be the same as the code word (Status Code) used with the appropriate qualifier in field 25D of its surrounding subsequence A2 Status. If the Data Source Scheme is present in field :25D:: then the conditional rule does not apply."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Within each occurrence of subsequence A2a, the qualifier in field 24B must be the same as the code word (Status Code) used with the appropriate qualifier in field 25D of its surrounding subsequence A2 Status. If the Data Source Scheme is present in field :25D:: then the conditional rule does not apply."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the message is an instruction status or a cancellation request status (:23G:INST or CAST), AND Sequence B is present,then sequence B should contain a CA option number and code (:13A::CAON and :22a::CAOP are mandatory)."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-13A-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number Id must be a number ranging from 001 to 999 or (Unsolicited) value UNS."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-A
fieldvalidation.comment: C3: In sequence B, field :36B::STAQ or QREC cannot appear more than twice (maximum two occurrences). When repeated, one occurrence must have Quantity Type Code FAMT and the other occurrence must have Quantity Type Code AMOR (Error code(s): C71).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, field :36B::STAQ or QREC cannot appear more than twice (maximum two occurrences). When repeated, one occurrence must have Quantity Type Code FAMT and the other occurrence must have Quantity Type Code AMOR."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-B
fieldvalidation.comment: C3: In sequence B, field :36B::STAQ or QREC cannot appear more than twice (maximum two occurrences). When repeated, one occurrence must have Quantity Type Code FAMT and the other occurrence must have Quantity Type Code AMOR (Error code(s): C71).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, field :36B::STAQ or QREC cannot appear more than twice (maximum two occurrences). When repeated, one occurrence must have Quantity Type Code FAMT and the other occurrence must have Quantity Type Code AMOR."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-1: If the message is a cancellation request status (:23G::CAST), then, in every occurrence of sequence A2 Status, a cancellation processing status must be reported (:25D::CPRC).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the message is a cancellation request status (:23G::CAST), then, in every occurrence of sequence A2 Status, a cancellation processing status must be reported (:25D::CPRC)."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-2: If the message is an instruction status (:23G::INST) then, in every occurrence of sequence A2 Status, an instruction processing status (:25D::IPRC...) must be reported.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the message is an instruction status (:23G::INST) then, in every occurrence of sequence A2 Status, an instruction processing status (:25D::IPRC...) must be reported."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-3: If the message is corporate action event processing status (:23G::EVST), then, in every occurrence of sequence A2 Status, an event status (:25D::EPRC...) must be reported.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the message is corporate action event processing status (:23G::EVST), then, in every occurrence of sequence A2 Status, an event status (:25D::EPRC...) must be reported"
